verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> I will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> [my] heart, <S%H3824><s%> In the company <S%H5475><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> and in the assembly. <S%H5712><s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> are the works <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> [They are] studied <S%H1875><s%> by all <S%H3605><s%> who delight <S%H2655><s%> in them.
Splendid <S%H1935><s%> and majestic <S%H1926><s%> is His work; <S%H6467><s%> And His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>
He has made <S%H6213><s%> His wonders <S%H6381><s%> to be remembered; <S%H2143><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is gracious <S%H2587><s%> and compassionate. <S%H7349><s%>
He has given <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H2964><s%> to those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him; He will remember <S%H2142><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

He has made <S%H5046><s%> known <S%H5046><s%> to His people <S%H5971><s%> the power <S%H3581><s%> of His works, <S%H4639><s%> In giving <S%H5414><s%> them the heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
The works <S%H4639><s%> of His hands <S%H3027><s%> are truth <S%H571><s%> and justice; <S%H4941><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> His precepts <S%H6490><s%> are sure. <S%H539><s%>
They are upheld <S%H5564><s%> forever <S%H5703><s%> and ever; <S%H5769><s%> They are performed <S%H6213><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> and uprightness. <S%H3477><s%>

He has sent <S%H7971><s%> redemption <S%H6304><s%> to His people; <S%H5971><s%> He has ordained <S%H6680><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> Holy <S%H6918><s%> and awesome <S%H3372><s%> is His name. <S%H8034><s%>

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> A good <S%H2896><s%> understanding <S%H7922><s%> have all <S%H3605><s%> those who do <S%H6213><s%> [His commandments]; His praise <S%H8416><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>
